testcase.name: Elearning Registration and Compose Mail
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Elearning Home page........................................passed When click on Signup Link...................................................passed And Registration page should appear.........................................passed And User Enters Mandatory Feild values "Test7","Test6","Test8@gmail.com","testt19","password","password" in step.passed And User Clicks on Register.................................................passed And User registration is successful "Test7","Test6".........................passed And User click on Compose Link..............................................passed And User Enter "aaa","Test mail","HELLO" in step............................passed And User Clicks on Send Message.............................................passed Then I verify the message is sent "My Organization - My education"..........passed
